about_the_game:
If you enjoy soundtrack of the Summer For You, this Pack is for you! You’ll be able to get all the original tracks from the amazing story.

The AniCore Team is very grateful for your support and wants to thank you wholeheartedly! By purchasing this Soundtrack you are helping us make more and better hentai games!

content_descriptors.notes:

The game contains adult material and scenes of a sexual nature with various fetishes: titjob, cunnilingus, blowjob, vaginal sex, anal sex and non-penetrative sexual acts. All sex in the game is consensual.
